summary: The PREEMIE Reauthorization Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize and update the Prematurity Research Expansion and Education for Mothers who deliver Infants Early Act. Key provisions include extending funding for research on preterm labor and delivery, modifying the timeline for establishing an interagency working group, and mandating a study by the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine on premature births, analyzing associated costs and risk factors, and offering recommendations for interventions and prevention.
